newsitem.title: USA: Phoenix extends US ONE letter of intent.
newsitem.headline: Phoenix extends US ONE letter of intent.

text.p: Phoenix Network Inc said Friday it has extended the terms of its letter of intent to merge with the privately held US ONE Communications Corp to June 9.
Phoenix, an inter-exchange carrier which also offers internet access and other services, said it anticipates signing a definitive agreement by the June deadline.

Phoenix had announced in April that it intended to merge with the Dallas-based local exchange carrier in a stock swap. At the time, the companies said they expected to complete the merger in three months.
No other information was immediately available.
